item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 28, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. How I Got Exploited at My First Startup (93 points | 36 comments)
2. Show HN: I built a hardware processor that runs Python (587 points | 165 comments)
3. Reports of widespread power cuts in Spain and Portugal (746 points | 659 comments)
4. Show HN: A pure WebGL image editor with filters, crop and perspective correction (53 points | 14 comments)
5. Show HN: Sim Studio – Open-Source Agent Workflow GUI (43 points | 9 comments)
6. Vision Transformers Need Registers (27 points | 7 comments)
7. Show HN: Web-eval-agent – Let the coding agent debug itself (35 points | 8 comments)
8. Is Outbound Going to Die? (9 points | 1 comment)
9. Activeloop (YC S18) Is Hiring VP of Engineering in Mountain View (On-Site) ( | hide)
10. Uncovering the mechanics of The Games: Winter Challenge (207 points | 91 comments)
11. Show HN: Autarkie – Instant grammar fuzzing using Rust macros (23 points | 4 comments)
12. Tiny-LLM – a course of serving LLM on Apple Silicon for systems engineers (128 points | 10 comments)
13. Generating Mazes with Inductive Graphs (2017) (5 points | discuss)
14. The Books of Earthsea by Ursula K. Le Guin (47 points | 17 comments)
15. Reanimation of the original Logic Theorist, the first AI, in IPL-V (20 points | 2 comments)
16. Internet in a Box (815 points | 205 comments)
17. Show HN: I made a web-based, free alternative to Screen Studio (404 points | 95 comments)
18. Reality Check (53 points | 31 comments)
19. AI helps unravel a cause of Alzheimer’s and identify a therapeutic candidate (298 points | 142 comments)
20. Ask HN: What are you working on? (April 2025) (240 points | 684 comments)
21. How a single line of code could brick your iPhone (445 points | 108 comments)
22. Why Pale Blue Dot generates feelings of cosmic insignificance (31 points | 45 comments)
23. Presentation Slides with Markdown (188 points | 67 comments)
24. Inference-Aware Fine-Tuning for Best-of-N Sampling in Large Language Models (65 points | 8 comments)
25. New material gives copper superalloy-like strength (156 points | 89 comments)
26. Read the Obits (269 points | 108 comments)
27. Did 5G kill the IMSI catcher? (247 points | 108 comments)
28. The hospital where staff treat fear of death as well as physical pain (94 points | 90 comments)
29. The suburban office park that launched Silicon Valley (116 points | 30 comments)
30. Boxie – an always offline audio player for my 3 year old (214 points | 72 comments)
